subject: Athletics and Sports
Football
lead_paragraph: Valparaiso is moving to the Horizon League in 2007, dropping out of the Mid-Continent Conference, where most of its teams have competed since 1982, the university said.
snippet: Valparaiso is moving to the Horizon League in 2007, dropping out of the Mid-Continent Conference, where most of its teams have competed since 1982, the university said.
